input_args.messages:
[{'role': 'system', 'content': 'choose an appropriate tool to use to answer the following thought based on the following tools:
wikipedia_search:Memoized version of wikipedia_search(q: str)

A tool to query wikipedia, useful when you need to find information about a specific topic or person that is well known.
Useful when you dont have enough context to reason about how to answer the question.

Args:
    q (str): The query string to search for

Returns:
    str: The wikipedia search results
run_python_code:Execute python code, useful when you need to do a calculation or a simple task
Input should be a valid python code.
If you want to see the output of a variable, the last line of the code should be that variable name.

Args:
    code (str): Python code to execute
    
Returns:
    str: Output from executing the code, either the value of the last line or the error message
    '}, {'role': 'system', 'content': 'choose an appropriate tool to use to answer the following:'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': '{'thought': "I need to determine Obama's current age."}'}]
input_args.response_schema: {'$defs': {'run_python_codeInput': {'additionalProperties': False, 'properties': {'code': {'description': 'Python code to execute', 'title': 'Code', 'type': 'string'}, 'tool_name': {'const': 'run_python_code', 'description': 'The name of the function to call', 'title': 'Tool Name', 'type': 'string'}}, 'required': ['code', 'tool_name'], 'title': 'run_python_codeInput', 'type': 'object'}, 'wikipedia_searchInput': {'additionalProperties': False, 'properties': {'q': {'description': 'The query string to search for', 'title': 'Q', 'type': 'string'}, 'tool_name': {'const': 'wikipedia_search', 'description': 'The name of the function to call', 'title': 'Tool Name', 'type': 'string'}}, 'required': ['q', 'tool_name'], 'title': 'wikipedia_searchInput', 'type': 'object'}}, 'properties': {'tool_input': {'discriminator': {'mapping': {'run_python_code': '#/$defs/run_python_codeInput', 'wikipedia_search': '#/$defs/wikipedia_searchInput'}, 'propertyName': 'tool_name'}, 'oneOf': [{'$ref': '#/$defs/wikipedia_searchInput'}, {'$ref': '#/$defs/run_python_codeInput'}], 'title': 'Tool Input'}}, 'required': ['tool_input'], 'title': 'ToolsInput', 'type': 'object'}
